channel.title: Public 2D Repository
channel.description:
I want this game to have the features of multiple popular games, such as RuneScape, Pokemon, Yu-Gi-Oh, MineCraft, Mortal Combat, Inotia, and so on.... The player would be able to play every one of these games as a whole and enjoy it. The idea is to keep it single player with an option to host the current work you have.
I need everyone's help with this project, so please request anything on the repo so we can make this game better than ever :D
[ul][li]Hunger will be the same as MineCraft: giving fishing and cooking a good role. Player interaction will make the character hungrier.[/li] [li]Building will be like MineCraft: giving construction a good role. Terrain can be generated randomly.[/li] [li]Farming could be used to plant and harvest berries and herbs for potions to heal pokemon.[/li] [li]Herblore would be used to make the potions.[/li] [li]Smithing would be used to make armour for your pokemon[/li] [li]Crafting could be used to make potion vials or poke balls[/li] [li]Combat stats would be used for pokemon moves like PP, Power, Accuracy, etc[/li] [li]Combat could be similar to mortal combat of 2012, where you would face opponents on a platform, and your moves would have mnemonics to them. The combat could be like Inotia, MineCraft, or even RuneScape.[/li] [li]Collecting cards similar to Yu-Gi-Oh cards could be obtained to apply abilities to your pokemon. They could be replacements for TM/HMs[/li] [li]Duels similar to how Yu-Gi-Oh duels works could be mini-games.[/li][/ul]
I currently have these things on the project:
[ul][li]Fullscreen Accessibility[/li] [li]Movable interfaces[/li] [li]A* Path Finding[/li] [li]Resource loading[/li] [li]Window Interfaces and widgets[/li][/ul]
The repository is public, so please place some pull requests if you like. I know a lot of people will disagree with how I handle things, but no one is perfect; that's why you make the pull requests for improvements! https://github.com/tehnewb/Single-Player-2D-Game
I will set up the networking for multiplaying after the single player state is completely playable.
This would be in 3D if I had really good knowledge over that subject.
Beginning of the Game [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CfTqgG258IY&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
PathFinding [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPttje1NLmk&list=UUu3d2OjoBjWTnWKQzpYEHVQ[/youtube]
Animations [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-g5n338qk3I&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
I know anyone would think that I'm trying to just make another pokemon game, but it won't be like any other. Original things should come and will be enjoyed.
[hr][b]Development on this will be delayed for a while; I'm taking a strong pain medication, so I wont be as functional.[/b]
